name: uns-kit
description: Monorepo for the UNS toolkit (core runtime and plugin packages)

scripts.sandbox:create: pnpm --filter @uns-kit/cli build && node packages/uns-cli/dist/index.js create sandbox-app
scripts.all:version:patch: pnpm version patch --filter @uns-kit/core && pnpm version patch --filter @uns-kit/api && pnpm version patch --filter @uns-kit/cron && pnpm version patch --filter @uns-kit/temporal && pnpm version patch --filter @uns-kit/cli
scripts.all:build: pnpm --filter @uns-kit/core build && pnpm --filter @uns-kit/api build && pnpm --filter @uns-kit/cron build && pnpm --filter @uns-kit/temporal build && pnpm --filter @uns-kit/cli build
scripts.all:publish: pnpm publish --filter @uns-kit/core --access public && pnpm publish --filter @uns-kit/api --access public && pnpm publish --filter @uns-kit/cron --access public && pnpm publish --filter @uns-kit/temporal --access public && pnpm publish --filter @uns-kit/cli --access public

author: Aljosa Vister
